name: Legally Blonde
summary_text: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

name: Rocky IV
summary_text: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

name: The World Is Not Enough
summary_text: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

name: Fracture
summary_text: An attorney intending on climbing the career ladder toward success finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
summary_text: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

name: Drag Me to Hell
summary_text: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

name: Run Lola Run
summary_text: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

name: Dark City
summary_text: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

name: Brazil
summary_text: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

name: The Evil Dead
summary_text: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

name: Ted 2
summary_text: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

name: Clueless
summary_text: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

name: Assassin's Creed
summary_text: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.

name: The Taking of Pelham 123
summary_text: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
summary_text: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
summary_text: Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.

name: Shrek Forever After
summary_text: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

name: Misery
summary_text: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

name: I, Tonya
summary_text: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

name: The Magnificent Seven
summary_text: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
summary_text: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

name: Unstoppable
summary_text: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

name: The Next Three Days
summary_text: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

name: Blue Valentine
summary_text: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

name: Alien vs. Predator
summary_text: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

name: Shame
summary_text: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

name: The Blues Brothers
summary_text: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.

name: The Vow
summary_text: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

name: Godzilla
summary_text: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

name: The Secret Life of Pets
summary_text: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

name: Ghostbusters II
summary_text: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

name: Resident Evil: Extinction
summary_text: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
summary_text: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

name: War Dogs
summary_text: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
summary_text: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

name: Secret Window
summary_text: A successful writer in the midst of a painful divorce is stalked at his remote lake house by a would-be scribe who accuses him of plagiarism.

name: Blue Velvet
summary_text: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
summary_text: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

name: Waterworld
summary_text: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

name: 17 Again
summary_text: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

name: The Emperor's New Groove
summary_text: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

name: Love & Other Drugs
summary_text: In 1990s Pittsburgh, a medicine peddler starts a relationship with a young woman suffering from Parkinson's disease.

name: The Darjeeling Limited
summary_text: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
summary_text: A Korean-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.

name: Tomorrow Never Dies
summary_text: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

name: The Hunt for Red October
summary_text: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine Captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
summary_text: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

name: Wrath of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

name: The Polar Express
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

name: Straight Outta Compton
summary_text: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

name: Air Force One
summary_text: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

name: Dracula Untold
summary_text: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

name: Basic Instinct
summary_text: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

name: Knight and Day
summary_text: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.

name: Birds of Prey
summary_text: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

name: Side Effects
summary_text: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

name: Paths of Glory
summary_text: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

name: Sideways
summary_text: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

name: Cruel Intentions
summary_text: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

name: Wild Tales
summary_text: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

name: The Judge
summary_text: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.

name: Taken 3
summary_text: Accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed, Bryan Mills goes on the run and brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.

name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
summary_text: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

name: The English Patient
summary_text: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

name: The Golden Compass
summary_text: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

name: Adaptation.
summary_text: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

name: Jupiter Ascending
summary_text: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.

name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
summary_text: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
summary_text: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

name: Saw III
summary_text: Jigsaw abducts a doctor in order to keep himself alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen named Jeff through a brutal test.

name: A Million Ways to Die in the West
summary_text: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his newly found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.

name: Chocolat
summary_text: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

name: Atomic Blonde
summary_text: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

name: Twister
summary_text: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

name: Chicken Run
summary_text: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
summary_text: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

name: Grindhouse
summary_text: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the '60s and '70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

name: The Invisible Man
summary_text: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

name: Enchanted
summary_text: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

name: Sausage Party
summary_text: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

name: Erin Brockovich
summary_text: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

name: Cinderella Man
summary_text: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

name: The Favourite
summary_text: In early 18th-century England, the status quo at the court is upset when a new servant arrives and endears herself to a frail Queen Anne.

name: Charlie's Angels
summary_text: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

name: Eagle Eye
summary_text: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

name: Jarhead
summary_text: A psychological study of a soldier's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

name: This Means War
summary_text: C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle on each other when they discover they are dating the same woman.

name: Stargate
summary_text: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

name: Swordfish
summary_text: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: Cape Fear
summary_text: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

name: The Last King of Scotland
summary_text: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

name: Rocky III
summary_text: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

name: The Man from Earth
summary_text: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

name: K-PAX
summary_text: PROT is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a faraway planet named K-PAX. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

name: Goldfinger
summary_text: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

name: Darkest Hour
summary_text: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

name: The Woman in Black
summary_text: A young solicitor travels to a remote village where he discovers that the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.

name: Battle Los Angeles
summary_text: A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.

name: The Thin Red Line
summary_text: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Hero
summary_text: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

name: The Iron Giant
summary_text: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

name: Falling Down
summary_text: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

name: The Platform
summary_text: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. Only one food platform and two minutes per day to feed. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.

name: The Bank Job
summary_text: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.

name: About a Boy
summary_text: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

name: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
summary_text: Lawman Luke Hobbs (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) and outcast Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham) form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.

name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
summary_text: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

name: xXx
summary_text: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

name: Ronin
summary_text: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

name: A Knight's Tale
summary_text: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

name: The Birds
summary_text: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

name: Spaceballs
summary_text: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

name: Tomorrowland
summary_text: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

name: The Promise
summary_text: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.

name: First Man
summary_text: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

name: Like Stars on Earth
summary_text: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Desperado
summary_text: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

name: Train to Busan
summary_text: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

name: Pocahontas
summary_text: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

name: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
summary_text: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

name: Enemy
summary_text: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

name: Happy Feet
summary_text: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

name: Rushmore
summary_text: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

name: Bright
summary_text: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.

name: Lilo & Stitch
summary_text: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

name: Pi
summary_text: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
summary_text: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: The Expendables 3
summary_text: Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.

name: Hostel
summary_text: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

name: The Mask of Zorro
summary_text: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

name: Get Him to the Greek
summary_text: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

name: 25th Hour
summary_text: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: 13 Going on 30
summary_text: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

name: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
summary_text: With the 1970s behind them, San Diego's top-rated newsman, Ron Burgundy, returns to take New York City's first twenty-four-hour news channel by storm.

name: Battle Royale
summary_text: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

name: Mud
summary_text: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: City Lights
summary_text: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

name: Melancholia
summary_text: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

name: High Fidelity
summary_text: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

name: Mama
summary_text: After a young couple take in their two nieces, they suspect that a supernatural spirit named Mama has latched onto their family.

name: Carrie
summary_text: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

name: Red Sparrow
summary_text: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

name: The Ninth Gate
summary_text: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

name: The Change-Up
summary_text: Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

name: Surrogates
summary_text: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

name: Black Mass
summary_text: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
summary_text: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
summary_text: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

name: The Tree of Life
summary_text: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

name: Shark Tale
summary_text: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

name: Dazed and Confused
summary_text: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

name: Breakfast at Tiffany's
summary_text: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

name: Independence Day: Resurgence
summary_text: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

name: The Seventh Seal
summary_text: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

name: Beverly Hills Cop
summary_text: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
summary_text: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

name: The Crow
summary_text: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

name: Layer Cake
summary_text: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

name: Akira
summary_text: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

name: The Danish Girl
summary_text: A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.

name: Blade: Trinity
summary_text: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

name: Space Jam
summary_text: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

name: REC
summary_text: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

name: The Apartment
summary_text: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

name: Girl, Interrupted
summary_text: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

name: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
summary_text: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

name: Planet of the Apes
summary_text: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

name: Deep Impact
summary_text: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

name: Mary and Max
summary_text: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

name: Ed Wood
summary_text: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

name: What Happens in Vegas
summary_text: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

name: 30 Days of Night
summary_text: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
summary_text: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal control officer.

name: Extraction
summary_text: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

name: Milk
summary_text: The story of Harvey Milk and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

name: PK
summary_text: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: The Legend of Tarzan
summary_text: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

name: Baywatch
summary_text: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

name: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
summary_text: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

name: The Karate Kid
summary_text: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

name: The Longest Yard
summary_text: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: Cars 2
summary_text: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary_text: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

name: The Abyss
summary_text: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

name: Upgrade
summary_text: Set in the near-future, technology controls nearly all aspects of life. But when the world of Grey, a self-labeled technophobe, is turned upside down, his only hope for revenge is an experimental computer chip implant.

name: Cool Hand Luke
summary_text: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

name: Army of Darkness
summary_text: A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.

name: Need for Speed
summary_text: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

name: Lethal Weapon 2
summary_text: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

name: The Heat
summary_text: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

name: Alexander
summary_text: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

name: He's Just Not That Into You
summary_text: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

name: Hot Tub Time Machine
summary_text: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
summary_text: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

name: Cinderella
summary_text: When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

name: Sleepless in Seattle
summary_text: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
summary_text: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

name: Central Intelligence
summary_text: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

name: Inferno
summary_text: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

name: Point Break
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

name: Beowulf
summary_text: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

name: The Fly
summary_text: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

name: Metropolis
summary_text: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

name: Event Horizon
summary_text: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

name: Over the Hedge
summary_text: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

name: Immortals
summary_text: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

name: Hitman
summary_text: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

name: RED 2
summary_text: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

name: American Made
summary_text: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

name: Legend
summary_text: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

name: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
summary_text: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

name: The Insider
summary_text: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

name: Dangal
summary_text: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: Three Kings
summary_text: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

name: Demolition Man
summary_text: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

name: Superman
summary_text: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

name: Dial M for Murder
summary_text: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

name: The Third Man
summary_text: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

name: What We Do in the Shadows
summary_text: Viago, Deacon and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane - like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

name: Exodus: Gods and Kings
summary_text: The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

name: In the Name of the Father
summary_text: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Team America: World Police
summary_text: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

name: King Arthur
summary_text: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

name: Horrible Bosses 2
summary_text: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
summary_text: A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

name: Mary Poppins
summary_text: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

name: Blades of Glory
summary_text: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

name: Road Trip
summary_text: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

name: The Lovely Bones
summary_text: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

name: Scream 2
summary_text: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

name: Rise of the Guardians
summary_text: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

name: Transporter 3
summary_text: Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.

name: Lethal Weapon 3
summary_text: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

name: The Man in the Iron Mask
summary_text: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

name: The Master
summary_text: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.

name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
summary_text: When Jacob (Asa Butterfield) discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

name: Evil Dead
summary_text: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

name: The Perfect Storm
summary_text: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

name: Michael Clayton
summary_text: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

name: Steve Jobs
summary_text: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

name: The Ghost Writer
summary_text: A ghost writer, hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

name: The Age of Adaline
summary_text: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

name: Insidious: Chapter 2
summary_text: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

name: Definitely, Maybe
summary_text: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

name: The Bone Collector
summary_text: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
summary_text: Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

name: The Green Hornet
summary_text: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.
